verbose_text: A novel polypeptide translated by long non coding RNAs exists in the late endosome / lysosome and interacts with the lysosomal V-ATPase, which may negatively regulate mTORC1 activation by amino acid stimulation, rather than by growth factors XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: lysosomal V-ATPase, which may negatively regulate mTORC1 activation by amino acid
